item.title: Notes about Prometheus & Grafana
item.description: Installation Prometheus & the related components (eg: pushgateway, blackbox_exporter, alertmanager) - scrape engine - it’s better to look at the README.md and Dockerfile on their github repo to get the information about the docker setup Grafana - for visualization; drawing graphs Node Exporter (via package manager) - Centos7 (need epel repo); Ubuntu20.04 - monitor VM’s states cAdvisor - monitor docker host’s states Others exporters kube-prometheus-stack (eks) - included grafana and prometheus
